attributes.action: help to save a small engineering firm outside leeds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i work for a small engineering firm  between leeds and bradford, it employs around 30 people! so its not as big as a bank and does not employ as many staff as a bank, but the 30 or so people that work there have the same commitments as any banker. the firm has been going since 1876 and not even the conservative government of the 80s and 90s could close it, but it looks like your government will do just that putting 30 families on the dole. i would like to know what you can do to stop this happening? yours neil

rejection.details: If you would like to write to the Prime Minister, you can find contact details here: http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
